sentences.english: Roger went across to the bed and put his hand on her arm.It was cold.
sentences.chinese: 罗杰走到床前把手放在她的手臂上，尸体已经冷了。

sentences.english: The Voyage of Captain Woodes Rogers, round the world.
sentences.chinese: 上尉的伍兹罗杰斯环球航行。

sentences.english: They have performed really, really well, ' according to buying director Holli Rogers.
sentences.chinese: 该网站采购主管罗杰斯说，灯笼裤卖的真的非常好。

sentences.english: I went there to meet Mr ClarksonRoger.
sentences.chinese: 我去那儿见克拉克森先生罗杰。

sentences.english: Roger was seen being with her before she died.
sentences.chinese: 有人看见在她死前罗杰和她在一起。

sentences.english: Roger wondered what else he could transform into fish roe.
sentences.chinese: 罗杰想知道他还能把什么东西转换进鱼卵里去。

sentences.english: It was unlikely that we should become confidants while Rogers was in retirement .
sentences.chinese: 在罗杰斯退职后，我们就未必能成为知己。

sentences.english: Roger looked at Diane but said nothing.
sentences.chinese: 罗杰看看黛安娜，但什么也没说。

sentences.english: Osbaldiston jabbed his finger at it, harking hack to our conversation about Roger.
sentences.chinese: 奥斯鲍迪斯顿用手指敲着它回到刚才关于罗杰的话题。

sentences.english: Roger repeated denials of the charges against him.
sentences.chinese: 罗杰再三否认套在他身上的罪名。

sentences.english: Albert sat down next to Roger.
sentences.chinese: 艾伯特坐在罗杰的旁边。

sentences.english: Rodger is fathoms deep in love with his wife.
sentences.chinese: 罗杰是他母亲的宝贝儿。

sentences.english: Roger's leg was deformed in an accident.
sentences.chinese: 罗杰的腿在一场事故中受伤变形。

sentences.english: When Rodger finally felt his feet touch bottom, he was gasping.
sentences.chinese: 当罗杰的脚终于触碰到水底时，他已气喘嘘嘘了。

sentences.english: With a yell, Roger threw open the screen door, tore through the kitchen and scrambled up the stairs.
sentences.chinese: 罗杰一声欢呼，猛然推开纱门，冲过厨房，奔上楼梯。

sentences.english: The Packers' coach has said Aaron Rodgers will be the starter.
sentences.chinese: 绿湾队的教练表示亚伦罗杰斯将担任先发球员。

definition: Clark T. Randt Jr. (1945-), US ambassador to Beijing 2001-2009
